name: Battle Bears: GO
summary: Battle Bears: GO is a top-down shooter (bird's-eye view), meaning players view the game a bird's eye view. It also has a two-player co-op mode. Players shoot with 3 different weapons and have lots of different power-ups to help fight off the Huggables. It is only available on the iPad, thought to be caused by the fact the game was too small for an iPhone/iPod Touch screen.
